data.description:
This is a short demo demo for the game Rogue Stargun, which can be purchased at the link below:

https://www.meta.com/experiences/7003408743005128

The demo may differ in control, comfort, and configuration options from the full game. It is strongly encouraged to purchase the full game and experience it for yourself!
-----
One hundred years ago the Federation Galactica fell in a great calamity.

The sentient races of the galaxy parted ways, and petty warlords took control of the great hyperspace gates.

Now your world is dying. You must journey towards the center of the galaxy to find the Ancient Core Igniter to save your planet.

With over 50 unique weapons and half a dozen unique VR starfighters, dogfight your way through multiple sectors both terrestrial and in deep space.

With fully interactive VR controls, and challenging immersive enemy AI, Rogue Stargun takes virtual space combat to the next level.

changelog.change_log: Revised demo built off of latest release live build of Rogue Stargun. Buy button added to several menus

Incorporate upstreamed fixes including render scale getting set to 1.0, preventing weapons cubes from flying away when close to sockets, and fixing replay of missions causing subsequent missions to be marked as incomplete.
Massively updated demo built created from Rogue Stargun 0.8.1 which is undergoing beta testing.
Audio channel fixes. Visual revamp of Scout Cockpit
First true candidate release for AppLab. May still have lingering audio issues.
